item.title: Alerting System (Audio/Visual) Courier/ Supernumerary Audio Alerting System – Upper Deck Call and Communication System Operative

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided Upper Deck Call and Communication System is operative.

placard.para: Placard below Captain’s PFD on P-1-1 panel "SUPERNUM AUDIO ALERT SYS INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
